website_summaries.verdict: Both nail technicians and the do-it-yourself crowd will love the speed and simplicity this professional-quality lamp offers.
pros: From the makers of Gelish polish
18 2-watt LED lights for a total of 36 watts
Compact, but plenty of room for a hand or foot
Removable magnetic bottom for easy cleaning
Preset LED display timer with countdown
cons: CND's shellac brand doesn't cure properly in this light

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience. Don't purchase from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience. Don't purchase from this seller. Did not work right out of the box and seller refused to exchange it! Disgusting in every sense of the word.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: It worked the first time and by the second use ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first time and by the second use the light would only turn on for a few seconds and by the time I was on the next layer it would shut off for anywhere from a minute to a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: great lamp, but the warranty is not recognized by ...
customer_reviews.text: great lamp, but the warranty is not recognized by the manufacturer because this is not an authorized dealer. I knew this when I purchased this, I'm just mentioning it here for others.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca 4*

customer_reviews.title: I don't really think it was new I think it was a return
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery than expected the unit did not look new and I say this because the packaging was all opened and bent and the electric cords not tied together with anything. It just Like somebody bought it took it out and put it back. The last one I ordered was not like this I could tell it was brand-new a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Batey

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful product
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with at-home gel manicures to save money and went with this model versus a cheaper one so I could do it quicker in my busy schedule. It works great. The only problem I've had is burning/stinging for the first 5-10 seconds of each 30-second cycle. I have to literally gritt my teeth to get to the point when the stinging goes away. I think if I were more patient and used a model that cured longer, that wouldn't be a problem. But I'm time-compressed, so I'm willing to deal with the stinging.
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 3 different led lamps and all were garbage. This one although expensive actually works. It works as well as what salons use. Completely dried my gel polish in 60 seconds and well worth the price tag if you want to do your nails at home. It will save you way more money than you spend going to the salon in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Langham 79

customer_reviews.title: this works great! I was getting my nails done with someone ...
customer_reviews.text: For a what its worth, this works great! I was getting my nails done with someone whom I've known for a while who charges an arm and a leg. I decided to invest in my own LED light and has been life changing for me and my pocket. I use my light all the time on myself and my siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Top Pick
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough about this product. I did a lot of research before purchasing a nail light, and it has lived up to its great reviews. The auto-on works really well, and the size and bulb placement allows for a whole-hand/foot cure. I've only had it since May and I don't use it in a professional salon (just at home), but I LOVE it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stef L

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: That's exactly what I've been looking for a long time. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend to everyone. Very easy to operate. And no problem. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this led light. It cures the Gelish in no time and I save myself about 30 mins. 5sec for the foundation, 30 for darker colors and 20 for top coat. I also like the shield that pulls down so you don't have the uv light on your hands and in your eyes. The buttons are in the back, but very easy to use and access.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, excellent quality LED nail lamp. I like the timed settings for the different layers used in producing gel nails, and even though one's nails feel hot when under the lamp, it only lasts a very short time and certainly isn't too uncomfortable. This is a nice looking, durable lamp that comes with a very well written manual. I am very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Girl of the Far NorthTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great! Well worth the price! Easy to use, you can fit your whole hand in! I had purchased two other little lamps in the past and this one doesn’t even compare! The bottom plate is magnetic and it removes for easy cleaning or for curing your toe nails! Its so much faster then anything I have used before! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie ball

customer_reviews.title: DIY and save
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for my wife. Instructions a little vague. But, overall very happy with product. Used twice and with some practice she’ll have nails as good as the salon at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Nicholas Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this. I am not a nail professional and getting it at a DEEP discount on Amazon made for a fantastic Christmas present to myself. I do my nails along with nails of friends and family on a regular basis and have absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter who just completed her cosmetology degree. She raves about how much she likes it. Very pleased with the results she gets. She is particular about quality, so I presume her happiness speaks well of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Curzio

customer_reviews.title: my wife absolutely loves this product and it works great in drying her nails
customer_reviews.text: my wife absolutely loves this product and it works great in drying her nails. she use to have to old ones that dry nails in 2-3mins and i know now that sounds like for ever till i got her this for mothers day gift and she loves it. this dries her nails in 10-20secs. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp did not cure the DND gel polish I used. This is the 3rd lamp I have bought from Amazon that has not worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month of me using it.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional nail tech running my own small business and this lamp stopped working after a month in half of me using it. I contacted the seller about this issue and they told they could not do anything about it. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY ON THIS BRAND AND ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: L♡ve it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I L♡ve it, after extensive research I decided to purchase this LED lamp to start doing my own gel nails at home. I purchased the Gelish fantastic four set at Amazon and Gelish, ASP and Finger Paints nail polish at Sally Beauty, I used Gelish and ASP nail polish the same day I received the lamp and my manicure turned out beautiful, I love this lamp, the base coat dries in 5 seconds and the nail polish and top coats 30 seconds each, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CKARMA99

customer_reviews.title: Wife said that this works very well. She does ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife said that this works very well. She does her own nails at home and uses it only about once a month. She has had not problems with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: J & N  Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Holy s@&t this light is amazing! It’s strong and works fast. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah L

customer_reviews.title: Gelish 18G Professional LED Light a Hit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a professional nail tech and she needed a new gel light. She gave me the information on the one she wanted and I found it on Amazon for the very best deal. Her customerrs are thanking her for this choice!
customer_reviews.author: EmersonPatty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gel nails
customer_reviews.text: This light is amazing. Really works well. Very happy with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective LED light.
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these for my 4 daughters. They have used them extensively in the last 2 weeks and were thrilled at the wonderful job they did. The higher wattage (light output at 18 W) worked much quicker than other lower wattage devices they have used and although they noted it was warm inside the light when they had their hands inside it was never uncomfortable. Hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RZD7X6

customer_reviews.title: I've been a nail tip for 25 years very impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been a nail tip for 25 years very impressed brand new shipped fast will definitely order from them again
customer_reviews.author: Roxee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality. My friend is a beautician and she uses the same one in the salon. Be careful to buy polish from a reputable source. Have had a couple problems with the cheap stuff on amazon. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Super fast drying
customer_reviews.text: But it! You won't regret it! Super fast drying. Good quality, nice packaging and fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: 🙌
customer_reviews.text: Light has been excellent and I use it several times daily.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves it. After getting the hang of ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it. After getting the hang of it she can do work as well as the ladies in the salon. Probably already paid for itself in the first month.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly fast!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I upgraded from a UV light to this particular LED light. I have now owned it for a long time & use it a few times a week. The bottom piece comes off (it's magnetic) for easy cleaning. I like the pre-set times, 5, 20, & 30 seconds. Super easy to use & clean!

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works really good, nails last a long tome but sometimes it burns (a lot) when you first put your fingers in (we’ve tried different brands of polish too)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saving me trips to the nail salon. Saving me money and time.

customer_reviews.title: Get your nail on
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. She’s had it a couple years now and it still works just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Best LED Light
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. I tried other LED light brands and this one works best. No need to go to nail saloon.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Doing my nails myself for 2 years. The light works great! It pays for it self in a very short time.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing. I got it as a Christmas gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I got it as a Christmas gift for my mom and she hasn’t stopped using it. It’s just like what they use at nail salons. It’s the best gift I got her

customer_reviews.title: so good. Just tri d my second gel manicure and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in time. So far, so good. Just tri d my second gel manicure and it looks great! Very happy with the new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: This light rocks!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally made the plunge and bought this light! It cures CND, Gelish in 60 seconds! It has changed my nail game for this point forward, no more big spending at the salons!
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Gives the perfect lasting manicure
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth every penny. Gives the perfect lasting manicure. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this, it's awesome and works great!!! It's pricey but so worth it. Never paying a nail salon again.
customer_reviews.author: Xtina Lynne

customer_reviews.title: So fast, compact, love the auto sensor light.
customer_reviews.text: The way the light comes on, activated immediately when you put your fingers inside is just fantastic. I can barely squeeze both hands in together (interlaced, one on top of the other), but that is ok, because I like that it is so compact. It's easy to pick up and carry and put up on the shelf when I'm done. The timer buttons on the back to adjust depending on which gel product your using are clear and simple to use. In short, there is not a single think I can think of to improve this.
customer_reviews.author: The Julia ListTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I saw it in my local salon and I decided to buy one for myself. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Z.

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect !!!! Just love it the best investment so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome led light! It cures fast and works well! It may be slightly priced higher than others but it is worth the xtra in my opinion! LED is safer for your skin than UV. And if you have your nails done regularly than you will make your money back in no time! PS it comes with strict instructions not to use other brands of gel polish so I was really scared to try but..... I did and it was perfectly fine!!! PS DONT LOOK AT THE LIGHT!!!! Its really hard not to but use the shield and look away!
customer_reviews.author: M. Courtois

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Happy to have this for my own oersonal ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ! Happy to have this for my own oersonal use !

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: just bought it for my mom, and she hasn't found/noticed any cons about it. 5 STARS

customer_reviews.title: I wish it has a cut off switch. You ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it has a cut off switch. You have to remember to unplug at the end of the day. Other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: DEE CRAFT

customer_reviews.title: I got this for Christmas and absolutely loved it and it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and absolutely loved it and it worked perfectly. It even cared gel polish says that don't care in other lights. I am a professional nail technician. But today at the end of February one of the sensors is not working. Which means when you're drying the left hand the light will not turn on automatically. I have not had this for very long and I am very disappointed it is not working properly. But I am past that Amazon return date.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: i waste my money in few machines before i decide this is my next one, Is expensive but is worth it , i do my own nails so i safe doing it at home and this one is so fast , the most time is with dark colors 30 seconds, my other one is about 5 minutes and believe me in theory 5 minutes is not that much but when you have your hands tide for 5 minutes it seems an eternity
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long enough for price paid
customer_reviews.text: As a professional nail technician I've been on the search for a great light. I've gone through four lights in 3 years and this one was no exception to the frustration. Perfect light, cures great, cures quick, never gave me any issues, until about nine months in. This light was close to $300 when I bought it and it didn't even last me a year before it quit curing out polish.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Im in love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light, its so fast and its nice to do all 5 fingers at once... Also it does feel warmer than other lights, not hot or heat spikes but just warmer. i love it so much i would suggest it to anyone who goes LED gels. Its compact and fits where i store my polishes too!
customer_reviews.author: Destinee Z

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great. It work very well, nice shape, my wife love it, tell co-work about it, they love it then they bought some.
customer_reviews.author: Canh MAi

customer_reviews.title: best spent money
customer_reviews.text: Dries all five fingers at once, saves me time, and dries super fast and evenly. Love it! I've used other lamps and this is by far the best one for your gel polish nails.
customer_reviews.author: gforbes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a nail tech so mine is only used for about 4 manis+2 pedis every two weeks. After reading other reviews I was a bit worried about spending so much on a light without a warranty, but after pricing this one at other nail supply stores I decided it was worth the risk. I've been using it for a year & so far, so good! Very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richins

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I adore this. Super-fast, safer, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great and so much faster than LED!
customer_reviews.text: This does all five nails in super fast times. (Between 5 and 30 seconds depending on the coat). I haven't had any problems as of yet and I have really cut down on the long manicure times when I used an LED for my gel polishes.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Love it.....
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever no more making appointments , do my nails at ease anytime of the day at little cost to me. Save time and money, what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Leuthner

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pay for what you want to get everyone. I feel safer by using it. Quick dryer, I can paint the shellac 2hands done in 7' and it last for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Thu Smith

customer_reviews.title: astonishing brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very happy it arrived in 7 to 10 working days it is a star buy if you do gelish nails then you need this lamp
customer_reviews.author: jacinta amgee

customer_reviews.title: Bought for daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my cosmetologist daughter. She loves it. It dries quickly and cuts down each manicure by 15 minutes! Multiply that by 6 a day and that's one hour and a half shaved off her day. Came quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A. Volk

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this lamp and I was not disappointed. It operates exactly as described and delivers excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Light
customer_reviews.text: Love the auto sensor that turns the light off and on when you put your nails under the light. Love the present times are perfect for gelish polishes. Nice size with plenty of room for hand & foot. Highly recommend this light. So glad I purchased this light. It's so easy to use and does an excellent job of curing in 5-30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Scottsdale AZ

customer_reviews.title: The best !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my LED lamp about two weeks ago. I cant believe it took me so long to get it if i knew how easy it was and how fast I would of bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: maiyoli

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Light
customer_reviews.text: Love this LED light. Nails look just like I came from a salon!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy, Works perfectly! With gelish but also other products.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Clouâtre

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Gelish will not honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: I would be able to give this a 5 star review except that after 10 months of use, the automatic on/off quit working. Of course it was too late to return it through the Amazon seller, and when I contacted Gelish, they would not honor the warranty for a product bought through Amazon. It is time to buy another, and I definitely would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter and she loves it! It was exactly what she wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Von Raabe

customer_reviews.title: This light is much better then most
customer_reviews.text: This light is much better then most. It cures the polish quickly and evenly. I am new to doing my own gel polish, but now that I have this, I feel like I can give myself a great manicure and pedicure without spending a fortune at the salon!
customer_reviews.author: goodytwoshoes1

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to do my own gels at home....it is so simple to use and so fast! I also purchased the basic kit along with a few colors. I am excited about the amount of money I am going to save and if I do mess up a nail, it takes 5 minutes to fix at home! I would highly recommend if you don't mind doing your own nails and if, like me, going to the salon is more of a hassle because you feel that you don't ever have the time.
customer_reviews.author: Holly N. Wood

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! My manicures have never been so fast! Plus the box it comes in has a handle on it so its perfect for when I pack my stuff up to travel to friends houses to do their nails.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!!! The speed in which nails are cured is awesome . I do my own nails as a cost saving measure & although this light isn't cheep it's worth every penny in the time I save. Not to mention not exposing skin to UV light has to be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Pens Name

customer_reviews.title: This machine works, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this machince due to the price, however this machine works just like in the salon. Its compact and quiet. The machince comes on automatically when you stick your hand in and shuts off when you remove your hand. Dont forget to buy your top and base coats (like I did). It still works without them but for a salon finish you should buy them. My nails look amazing, I will probablly never have to go back to the salon again unless I need my cuticles trimmed. It works buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer,
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a few days ago so far it works great. However, the lift to protect the eyes had polish that ran underneath the lid, so this dryer had been used & returned for whatever reason. It works good so far. Just hope it last as long as they say.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is so so not dry fast like opi lamp
customer_reviews.author: tam tran

customer_reviews.title: So worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: If you get your nails done with gel at any salon, you will not be disappointed with this product. It is EASIER than painting your nails with regular polish! And since you get them done at the salon you already know the process. Seriously, if you can afford the initial purchase, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is my second one! I previously order the cnd lamp but this one is way better and is way faster! Love it so glad I I purchased this one!
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle working system
customer_reviews.text: Bought this system after a dermatologist told my friend that people are getting cancer on their nails using the UV lamps. LED is the way to go. This system is wonderful. Five seconds for base coat. Thirty seconds for each coat and the same for the top coat. And there you have it. Would not go back to the UV lamp ever. Best thing is...you do all five fingers at once. Love love love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: This has already paid for itself! Gel manicure ranges from 25-35 dollars give or take. Heck, maybe more! I have to say that the first time giving myself a gel mani it took me a while but after the second and third time, it was a breeze! I actually LOVE doing my own nails. This LED device is exactly the same one they use where I used to get my nails done at. Nothing beats pampering yourself in the comfort and cleanliness of your own home! I now spend what used to be my mani/pedi money on fancy food or a massage.
customer_reviews.author: allmeowtome

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine must get if you still using UV Light
customer_reviews.text: Great machine!! Cut my shellac time in half from using uv bulb. Only thing is make sure you hear the 3 beeping instead one one beep, because sometime customer move their hand and the sensor reset the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bui

customer_reviews.title: The power cord
customer_reviews.text: The power cord is not working. I always have to move it to make it work, and it takes forever sometimes! SO EXPENSIVE!
customer_reviews.author: Duc C. Le

customer_reviews.title: No Manual
customer_reviews.text: As stated by the previous reviewer, mine also came with no manual, which greatly disappointed me. I have only used the lamp once so far and it worked well -- it's great to have such a short curing time! But $300 is a lot of money and I would like the manual :-(
customer_reviews.author: LKL

customer_reviews.title: 18G LED light
customer_reviews.text: Short in cord, have to play with it to get it to work! Cant afford to take the tme to send back!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on all Gel Polishes
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!!! This light only cures Gelish Polish which Gelish sells. The seller does not state this in the description and will not return my money. I use many different types of color gels and Gel Builder products. There is nothing in their description to state this, and now this company will not return my money. They say its for sanitary reasons, however their description says it can be fully sanitised. Don't Buy It, unless you only use Gelish, and you dont care about a return policy if it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: nailtechrobin

customer_reviews.title: lamps out after just 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this twice and it's already started to act up - not all of the lights are coming on. It dries great - when it works. For 200 bucks it should last longer than 2 uses. I was very careful with it so I can't imagine it has suffered any damage. I will attempt to return and probably replace with a less expensive lamp. Looking at the reviews it seems like none of them last very long so at least if I pay less it won't cost me much to replace a cheaper lamp.
customer_reviews.author: cherrytomatopie

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why I ever did uv!
customer_reviews.text: I will never go back to UV lights! They take too long and if you do more than 2 coats they will wrinkle, not with this light!!!! I can do 4-5 coats when the color is very light and will never wrinkle, plus it takes no time to cure, no more timers needed either! It does have the automatic timer, so you can't over do it or under do it. I'm not sure why I even did UV only lamps before!! Worth every penny!!!!!!! Highly recommend it.oh, and it works on all of my Uv only polishes!!! So no waste here!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Half the lights dimmed within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to save money and save my nails from the harsh treatment at local salons, so purchased the light and needed supplies. Worked well to begin with, but then the gel on the right half of either hand didn't cure. The lights in that half of the device are way too dim. It now takes me twice as long to do my nails as I can at most cur 3 nails at a time. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sievert

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: This has been a real game changer since the Covid quarantine. I’m able to keep up my own nails on my own time. The money I’ve saved from going to the salon has paid for my initial do it yourself nail investment. This is very easy to use, anyone can do it. Also, they have awesome customer service. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 4Teacup

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based off reviews and because this looked exactly like the one my nail tech uses. I returned this item after trying to use it two times to cure my gel polish and both times it failed to do so. Even after trying to cure it for longer than the recommended time it never seemed to dry properly. I've bought and tried the cheaper ones and they were pretty bad so I thought I'd try and spend some money on a more expensive one and I still didn't get the results I was looking for. Not sure if it was a defective item but at $200 I decided to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: The light when it's work is great. I find it works only intermittently
customer_reviews.text: The light when it's work is great. I find it works only intermittently. I have not had time to deal with the problem. I wold like it to be corrected so I an do my nails on my schedule.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Gel Nail Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This really works. Five seconds & it is dry, no smearing. I had the Gelish 45 (smaller unit) & it took 5 minutes. Your entire hand/foot fits comfortably into the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria P

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp if you're neat with your polish.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp makes quick work of doing my nails! If I get a little polish on my skin, it hurts under the light. But, as long as get the polish only where it's supposed to go, all I feel is a little warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product; bought it a few years ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product; bought it a few years ago and it still works great. I use it with Shellac and Gelish and it cures the gel polish quickly! I enjoy it :)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: This LED light rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic LED light helps me create beautiful weekly manicures at home. The investment has been worth it to me because I save money since I don’t go to nail salons anymore. Its sensor is sensitive & the lights are stellar. I am glad that I made this purchase and would recommend this item to anyone looking for a product to cure frequent gel manicures at home quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Hilaria

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I learned to do my own gel nails since staying at home. This unit is much quicker than the cheaper ones but it is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Forrestel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s easy to use and well built. Zero complaints. If you want to do your own nails at home this is a fantastic light.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light for gel polish addicts.
customer_reviews.text: The mother of all LED lights. I can do a gel manicure twice as fast with this light. It cures all 5 fingers and the light hits the entire nail bed. No more partially cured nails or having to turn your fingers on the sides to cure the edges. Love this light. 5, 20 and 30 second timer. I do with it was 5, 30 and 60 seconds though. I need the longer cure time for a no wipe top coat. Bottom is removable for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: A Comedian's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Has 3 timer settings
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Has 3 timer settings. Removable bottom plate for easy cleaning and easy way to do toe nails! Auto turn on when you put you fingers in. Has a guard that can be pulled down to protect your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I do my manicure at home and this makes it better. super fast drying like at the nail salon.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas present for my girlfriend and she ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. It's exactly the same model used at the nail salon she USED to go to, this saves her quite a bit of money each month. Protip: Do not cheap out on your gel polish, get the expensive stuff and the proper prep coat, top coat, and sealant, a little investment up front saves you a ton of money down the line!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gutierrez

product_meta.title: Gelish Harmony 18G Professional Salon Gel Nail Polish Dryer Cure LED Lamp Light
feature_bullets: LED accelerated for the fastest nail curing and drying in the industry, curing Gelish foundation in 5 seconds
Preset LED display timer with countdown times: 5, 20, and 30 seconds
Manicure and pedicure-friendly; cures all 5 fingers, and toes
Magnetic tray for effortless, thorough sanitizing and acetone resistance
Features patent-pending eyeShield, which limits light exposure
